<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonBeginSkin" states="up,down" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" width="255" height="102">
    <e:Image id="bgImage" width="100%" height="100%"
             anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetX.down="0" y.down="2" x.down="1" source.down="kaishi_1_png" source="kaishi_1_png"/>
	<e:Image id="bgImage0" width="100%" height="100%" anchorOffsetX="0" x="0" y="0" source="kaishi_2_png" x.down="2" y.down="1" visible="false"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="20"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8" ?>
<e:Skin class="skins.ButtonHongSkin" states="up,down,disabled" minHeight="50" minWidth="100" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:tween="egret.tween.*" width="245" height="75">
	<w:Declarations>
	</w:Declarations>
    <e:Image width="100%" height="100%" alpha.disabled="0.5"
            
             anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetX.down="0" y.down="2" x.down="1" source="zww_btn_hong_png" scale9Grid="76,36,261,41" source.down="zww_btn_hong_png"/>
    <e:Label id="labelDisplay" top="8" bottom="8" left="8" right="8"
             size="30"
             textColor="0xFFFFFF" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center"/>
    <e:Image id="iconDisplay" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.GamePlaySkin" width="1280" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing" xmlns:ns1="*">
	<e:Image width="1280" height="960" x="0" y="0" source="zww_bg_png"/>
	<e:Group id="grpGame" width="1280" height="960" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image id="panel_bg" width="2560" height="238" x="0" y="755" source="zww_bg_ysd_png" fillMode="repeat" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5"/>
		<e:Image id="panel_up_bg" width="2560" height="238" x="0" y="555" source="zww_bg_ysd_png" fillMode="repeat" scaleX="0.5" scaleY="0.5"/>
		<e:Group id="grpUpPanel" width="1280" height="115" x="0" y="483" anchorOffsetY="0">
			<ns1:Avatar id="origAvatar2" width="165" height="268" x="560.1" y="-145" skinName="skins.AvatarSkin" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" enabled="false"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="grpDownPanel" width="1280" height="115" x="0" y="683" anchorOffsetY="0">
			<ns1:Avatar id="origAvatar1" width="165" height="268" x="224.07" y="-145" skinName="skins.AvatarSkin" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" enabled="false"/>
		</e:Group>
		<e:Group id="grpArraw" width="165" height="960" y="-682" horizontalCenter="0.5">
			<e:Image width="36" height="960" y="-97.5" source="zww_icon_z_png" fillMode="repeat" x="65"/>
			<e:Image id="arraw1" width="140" height="112" x="13" y="845" source="zww_icon_z1_png" visible="false"/>
			<e:Image id="arraw2" width="140" height="116" x="12" y="845" source="zww_icon_z2_png"/>
			<e:Image id="arraw3" width="165" height="115" x="0" y="845" source="zww_icon_z3_png" visible="false"/>
			<e:Group id="arrawArea" width="16" height="16" y="919" horizontalCenter="0"/>
		</e:Group>
	</e:Group>
	<e:Group id="grpUp" width="1280" height="200" x="0" y="0">
		<e:Image width="77" height="960" x="57" y="0" source="zww_bg_b_png" scaleX="-1"/>
		<e:Image width="77" height="960" y="0" source="zww_bg_b_png" scaleX="1" right="-20"/>
		<e:Image width="1280" height="190" x="0" y="-16" source="zww_bg_t_png"/>
		<e:Image width="1280" height="109" x="0" y="-16" source="zww_bg_tt_png"/>
		<e:Image width="288" height="84" x="38.06" y="169" source="zww_bg_m_png" scaleX="1" scaleY="1"/>
		<e:Label id="labCredits" text="1/10" x="203" y="196" anchorOffsetX="0" width="91" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" fontFamily="Arial" size="28"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.GameRewardSkin" width="860" height="860" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:ns1="*" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="860" height="860" source="zww_bg_g2_png" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Image width="720" height="488" x="70" y="248" source="zww_bg_k_png" scale9Grid="75,127,2,769" anchorOffsetY="0"/>
	<e:Image width="542" height="120" x="159" y="188" source="zww_bg_btk_png"/>
	<e:Image width="712" height="222" x="78" y="137" source="zww_bg_g_png"/>
	<e:Image width="491" height="191" x="188.5" y="325" source="zww_bg_hdk_png"/>
	<e:Label text="获得奖励" x="307.67" y="208" anchorOffsetX="0" width="255.33" anchorOffsetY="0" height="50" verticalAlign="middle" textAlign="center" bold="true"/>
	<e:Label id="labItemName" text="20元话费" x="252" y="413.33" anchorOffsetY="0" height="63.34" anchorOffsetX="0" width="324.67" textAlign="center" verticalAlign="middle" size="32" textColor="0xefdd07"/>
	<ns1:ButtonHuang id="btnplay" label="继续游戏" y="626" width="238" height="75" skinName="skins.ButtonHuangSkin" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0" horizontalCenter="0"/>
	<e:Group width="627.67" height="89.67" x="115.65" y="522.33" anchorOffsetX="0" anchorOffsetY="0">
		<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" source="zww_bg_k_d_png" anchorOffsetX="0" scaleX="1" scaleY="1" scale9Grid="25,26,2,2"/>
		<e:Label id="labDesc" text="Label" x="23.33" y="5.33" anchorOffsetY="0" height="82" anchorOffsetX="0" width="580.67" size="24" textColor="0x755f5f"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<e:Skin class="skins.LoadingSkin" width="1280" height="960" xmlns:e="http://ns.egret.com/eui" xmlns:w="http://ns.egret.com/wing">
	<e:Image width="100%" height="100%" x="0" y="0" source="loading_bg_png"/>
	<e:Group width="400" height="400" horizontalCenter="0" verticalCenter="0">
		<e:Image id="load_1" width="268" height="50" y="265" source="loading_1_png" x="66"/>
		<e:Image id="load_2" width="268" height="50" y="265" source="loading_2_png" x="66" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="load_3" width="268" height="50" y="265" source="loading_3_png" x="66" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="load_4" width="268" height="50" y="265" source="loading_4_png" x="66" visible="false"/>
		<e:Image id="load_j_1" width="168" height="208" y="50" x="88" source="loading_j1_png"/>
		<e:Image id="load_j_2" width="168" height="208" y="50" x="88" source="loading_j2_png" visible="false"/>
	</e:Group>
</e:Skin>
